name: m2x-classified-ads
description: M2X Classified Ads - Full Stack Application with separated Frontend and Backend

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/node_modules backend/dist frontend/node_modules frontend/.next node_modules
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
